about_the_game:
Sharded World: Backpack Adventure is an exciting and strategic game that allows you to showcase your strategic and creative skills. In this game, you will have to build your own backpack, purchase equipment, upgrade it, and use it to defeat your opponents in thrilling duels.

You are a zombie Slime, whose main power is to control the bodies and minds of creatures.
Capturing the bodies of heroes, the slimes fight to prove their superiority over the rest.
Here you have a chance to capture the hero's body, and finally enter the battle for recognition.
With the help of the hero you will be able to purchase backpacks and items from the merchant, improve and combine them to become stronger.
Create various interesting combinations of equipment that would surpass your opponent, and become the strongest in the dungeon and show who is the boss of the house!



  • 4 unique heroes with different abilities
  • Numerous items and recipes to create powerful equipment
  • Runes that you need to compose into a variety of words, adding unique properties to your gear
  • Ranking system to test your strength against other players
  • A revolutionary backpack system based on hexagons that provides more freedom when creating combinations
  • Asynchronous matchmaking to fight with your friends whenever you like



Each hero whose body you take over has unique abilities. Depending on your choice, you can change the starting backpack, equipment, and goods in pocket at the merchant. Additionally, each hero has a bias for different types of characteristics, such as health, strength, poison, etc.



Acquire rare and legendary items, upgrade and combine them, and strategize their placement to create formidable equipment. Your choices in item acquisition and placement will impact your chances of victory.



Engage in exciting battles with other players using your backpack of gear as your arsenal. The more strategic you are in placing items, the more powerful your character becomes.

Compete against real gear created by other players in thrilling matches, discover their innovative combinations, and come up with countermeasures to outsmart them. Climb the ladder in the competitive Ranked mode to test your mettle or relax in the laid-back Casual mode.

Get your backpack ready! Purchase rare and legendary items and build powerful builds with them. Then, battle it out with other players!

AND DON'T FORGET TO ADD IT TO YOUR WISH LIST. IT WILL HELP US SPEED UP THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE GAME!
